meanings.sent1: The garbage left in the hot sun was so stinko.
meanings.sent2: The skunk sprayed a stinko smell when it felt threatened.
meanings.sent3: The stinko smell from the old socks made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The stinko odor filled the room like a cloud of yuckiness.
meanings.sent5: The stinko stench was so bad, it made my eyes water.

meanings.definition: A situation or event that is very unpleasant or disappointing.
meanings.sent1: The canceled picnic was a real stinko.
meanings.sent2: Getting caught in the rain without an umbrella was a total stinko.
meanings.sent3: The birthday cake falling on the floor was a stinko moment.
meanings.sent4: The stinko of failure lingered in the air after the test results were announced.
meanings.sent5: The stinko of defeat was hard to shake off after losing the game.
